text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 

Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2020.

title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: 3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 121 of 2020) (amended by the Health Act 1947
text_raw:
3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 121 of 2020) (amended by the Health Act 1947 
(Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 128 of 2020)) are amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 2, by the substitution of “the 18th day of May 
2020” for “the 5th day of May 2020”, and 

in Regulation 4(2)(i), by the substitution of “within a 5 
kilometre radius of that residence” for “within a 2 kilometre 
radius of that residence”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Health, 

2 May, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th May, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [153] 3

title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend Regulation 2 the Health Act 1947 (Section 31ATemporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 121 of 2020) 
to provide that the Regulations shall remain in operation until 18 May 2020. 
The Regulations also amend Regulation 4(2)(i) to extend the radius referred to 
there from 2 kilometres to 5 kilometres. The amendment to Regulation 4 will 
come into effect on 5 May 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [153]
